URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE TAUNTON MA
1245 PM EDT THU OCT 23 2014

CTZ004-MAZ005>007-012>021-NHZ012-RIZ001>007-240045-

WINDHAM CT-CENTRAL MIDDLESEX MA-WESTERN ESSEX MA-EASTERN ESSEX MA-
SOUTHERN WORCESTER MA-WESTERN NORFOLK MA-SOUTHEAST MIDDLESEX MA-
SUFFOLK MA-EASTERN NORFOLK MA-NORTHERN BRISTOL MA-
WESTERN PLYMOUTH MA-EASTERN PLYMOUTH MA-SOUTHERN BRISTOL MA-
SOUTHERN PLYMOUTH MA-EASTERN HILLSBOROUGH NH-
NORTHWEST PROVIDENCE RI-SOUTHEAST PROVIDENCE RI-WESTERN KENT RI-
EASTERN KENT RI-BRISTOL RI-WASHINGTON RI-NEWPORT RI-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...PUTNAM...WILLIMANTIC...FRAMINGHAM...
LOWELL...LAWRENCE...GLOUCESTER...MILFORD...WORCESTER...FOXBORO...
NORWOOD...CAMBRIDGE...BOSTON...QUINCY...TAUNTON...BROCKTON...
PLYMOUTH...FALL RIVER...NEW BEDFORD...MATTAPOISETT...MANCHESTER...
NASHUA...FOSTER...SMITHFIELD...PROVIDENCE...WEST GREENWICH...
WARWICK...BRISTOL...NARRAGANSETT...WESTERLY...NEWPORT
1245 PM EDT THU OCT 23 2014

...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING...

* LOCATION...NORTHEAST CONNECTICUT...MUCH OF CENTRAL AND EASTERN 
  MASSACHUSETTS AND RHODE ISLAND.

* WINDS...NORTH 10 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH...ESPECIALLY
  NEAR THE COAST.

* TIMING...THROUGH EARLY TONIGHT.

* IMPACTS...STRONG WINDS MAY DOWN TREE LIMBS AND POWER LINES... 
  RESULTING IN ISOLATED POWER OUTAGES. THE HEAVY RAIN COMBINED 
  WITH FULLY LEAFED TREES WILL LIKELY EXACERBATE THE POTENTIAL 
  FOR DOWNED TREE LIMBS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

DRIVING CAN ALSO BE DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE
VEHICLES. BE ALERT FOR DOWNED TREE LIMBS ON ROADS. STAY CLEAR OF
DOWNED WIRES.

&&
